short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Azur Lane wallpaper turn new tab to HD Azur Lane background. Custom Azur Lane wallpaper theme for fans.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension Features:

1. Refresh your Azur Lane wallpaper with each new tab.
2. Choose or favorite your Azur Lane backgrounds in the selection panel.
3. Integrated Google search bar.
4. Quick links to email and social media platforms.
5. Automatically displays the current date and time.
6. New note feature to jot down tasks.
7. Direct access to your most frequented websites.
8. Simplified bookmark access.
9. Shortcut panel for adding and accessing websites quickly.
10. Instant links to Google applications.
11. Access to additional themes.
12. Streamlined social media sharing.
13. Quick options to download wallpapers.
14. Fast access to gaming.
15. Activate dynamic weather and seasonal animations like snow, rain, and fireworks on your Azur Lane tab.
